name: Lil'Thulu: Doom Rising
description:
Arrow keys or WASD to move, Space to use ability. and Escape to pause game.

Inspired by Ecco the Dolphin on the Sega Genesis you play as Lil'Thulu devouring creatures of the deep to gain powers. But you're still Lil' so be careful as some things in the deep will end your reign early.
